page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN SANDWICK(cont)
page.content: There is a Unisex hairdressing salon at Leebitton employing one person. There is a district nurse and a health visitor. The doctors visit the surgery twice each week. There are many crofters many of whom have other part or full time employ- ment. There are two farms at Burnbank and Sandlodge providing a dairy ser- vice and employing eight people. There is one minister, one mission- ary, several shop assistants, one postman and a warden who caretakes for the sheltered housing complex for old people at Park Wynd. The school employs 25 full and part time teachers, 2 janitors, 2 part-time clerkesses and 6 kitchen assistants. The hotel in Hoswick employs 4 people and the tearoom at Leebitton 1.
